Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2013 10:43PM - edited Sep 11, 2013 10:46PM by EMarie Breast Cancer in women under 50 is a big red flag! You can probably get genetic testing based on that alone. The counselor will look at your family history and try to determine where you got the gene mutation. Best of luck to you.
